title: Revolver
desc:
Post 884
-When played, this card will instead go to the next player’s hand. Every time this card is played, there is a 1 in 6 chance that the revolver will fire, making whoever played it last draw 5 cards
-When the revolver goes off, it will no longer go to the next player’s hand
-This card skips whoever played it first, and will not fire on them the first time they play it
